name: Circles (itch) (SolidBoots)
description:
~ Welcome to CIRCLES ~ 

  You are a Circle, and you have to stay on top and not touch the edge or fall into the void, while other Circles are trying to destroy you! (PC: Use Arrows Keys or WASD keys)                                                                                            

Bad Circles: Blue and Green Circles Fall. Yellow falls, stop, and goes in a random direction. Red shoot towards your position, Orange inflate and deflate. Purple goes wherever they want, and Pink fall and stop.

There is a many power-ups, Blue one that gives you 5+ Points, Orange that reverse gravity and gives you 10 points, green that slows down time, and purple that shrinks you! The Number on the top-right is the Difficulty Value.

Circles: Do the Task to get the one! Levels: You can go through 20 Levels.

Shortcuts: Q = Back, E = Next, R = Retry.

Good luck.

Credits:

Music: "BOT LAB", (Gameplay Music) and "With Haste" (Final Boss Music) - Mawnz

"Cleod Groove" (Main Menu Music ), "Mind Gear", "Incompatible Type", and "Enter the Fray" (Bosses) - Cleod 9

Green Grapes (Tutorial)

Notes:

There's a bug where you can't put any keyboard input into the game when you open the game, so if that's the case, refresh. (Data will save in this game also).

Glitches? Please tell me down in the comments.

There are bright rapid lights in this game sooooo be aware...

This game is not easy, so yea.
